name: bbPress reCaptcha
author: Pippin Williamson

sections.description:
Sick of getting spam on your bbPress 2.0 forums? This will add a reCaptcha anti-bot system to your new topic and topic reply forums.

It’s very simple to use. Just activate, then go to Settings > bbPress reCaptcha and enter your Public and Private keys.
sections.installation:
1. Upload bbpress-recaptcha to wp-content/plugins
  2. Click “Activate” in the WordPress plugins menu
  3. Go to Settings > bbPress reCaptcha and enter your public and private keys
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Added localization for international support

1.0.3

  • Added option to disable the reCaptcha for logged in users

1.0.2

  • Added reCaptcha to the new topic creation form

1.0.1

  • Removed the reCaptcha on topic replies for logged in administrators

1.0

  • Initial Release

short_description: This is a simple plugin that adds a recaptcha validation to the bbPress 2.0 topic creation and topic reply forum.
